import React, {useState,useReducer, useContext} from 'react'; const HooksForm =()=>{ const [stateForm,setStateForm] = useState(""); return(



React useState:

Change: {valueChange}

Submit: {valueSubmit}


React useReducer:

Change: {state.user_textChange}

Submit: {state.user_textSubmit}


React useContext:

Change: {context.useContextChangeState}

Submit: {context.useContextSubmitState}



) } export default HooksForm;
